TopicTitle: Kerbal died on Mun EVA, how do I get back to ship?

Articles.Content: I finally landed on the Mun so decided to go on a little Mun walk with Bob. Unfortunately he hit the ground too hard and died. How can I continue my mission? Thanks in advance.

Well to get your rocket back you just bring a three kerbal crew pod and when landing use the orbital map to look for the lander you previously used and land next to it I know it sounds tricky but it is do-able

Edit: Sorry forgot something. Just bring one of your kerbals out of the three crew pod and walk him into your ship.

[ and ] keys will cycle through nearby debris/ships/kerbals. If you got too far away for that then you may be able to pick it up from the tracking centre (I'm not sure if that works for empty one man capsules).

You can access the flight through your tracking station, however with no Kerbals aboard you will be unable to control the ship at all. Your best bet is to send a 3 man pod to the downed ship, EVA one of your Kerbals, and stick him in the empty ship. Good luck!
